1.title: The Circuit

episode of.title: Your Husband Is Cheating on Us (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: JD Lawrence is an American writer, director, and producer of films, television, and stage plays. JD Lawrence, also known as "The King of Dramedy," has mastered the art of improvisation infused with drama, comedy, and music. In 2018, JD Lawrence in his one-man show, SKITZophrenia played 63 characters, beating the Guinness World Record holder of 53 characters since 2001. The multi-hyphenate has been dubbed "The Man of Many Faces" by EBONY Magazine. 2.title: The Show and the Showdown

episode of.title: Your Husband Is Cheating on Us (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Rehearsals have their ups and downs as the cast tries to learn their lines. Ginuwine isn't sure this role is for him, D'atra confronts Kristen about an issue, and the connection between Tondy and Ginuwine is heating up.

3.title: Runaway Pony

episode of.title: Your Husband Is Cheating on Us (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Tensions are still high in the townhouse and after experiencing the wrath of D'atra, the cast wants nothing to do with her. Rehearsals are divided, D'atra is separated from the rest of the cast, and JD struggles to unite everyone.

4.title: Walk it Out

episode of.title: Your Husband Is Cheating on Us (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: In the aftermath of D'atra's firestorms, everyone tries to find some sense of normality. The drama in the house seems to be calming down, but a tense filled rehearsal triggers Taylour to reignite old issues.

5.title: House of Drama

episode of.title: Your Husband Is Cheating on Us (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: On the heels of yet another blow up with D'atra, the cast chooses to give the "Beyoncé of Theater" the cold shoulder. Meanwhile, the cast is frustrated and concerned that their leading man is so disengaged.

6.title: And Scene

episode of.title: Your Husband Is Cheating on Us (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: With two weeks left, the cast is down to the wire, and JD has no more time for excuses. Seemingly everyone is getting their act together but an unexpected change to production leaves the entire cast stunned and upset. Will the house be able to weather yet another storm?

7.title: Girl Fight

episode of.title: Your Husband Is Cheating on Us (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: With the cast still reeling over the latest departure, JD wastes no time bringing in a new face. This well-known thespian in the Circuit is a breath a fresh air in the midst of all the drama.

8.title: Curtain Call

episode of.title: Your Husband Is Cheating on Us (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: JD Lawrence's Your Husband Is Cheating On Us is written and directed by JD Lawrence. Lawrence gives his fans and viewers a first time backstage pass into the world of Urban Theater.

imdb.plot outline: "Your Husband Is Cheating On Us" follows mega-producer JD Lawrence and his top-tier theater company through all the five-star action and juicy drama that comes with launching a new stage production. For generations, the urban theater experience has been a thriving component of African American entertainment in the United States. "Your Husband Is Cheating On Us" will shine a light on this powerful world revealing the show behind the show. From love affairs to long standing rivalries and up-and-comers trying to take down established theater royalty, there is no room for mistakes, and everything that happens behind the curtain is revealed.
